level.text: The child-placing agency shall comply with the District of Columbia laws and regulations in its selection of foster family homes in the District of Columbia.
Each child-placing agency shall use only licensed foster homes for the placement of children.

Each child-placing agency shall comply with the laws governing placement of each jurisdiction involved in the placement of a child, and the rules and regulations governing foster care of each state in which a child is placed.

level.heading: EDITOR’S NOTE
level.text: See Chapter 60 of this title for rules of the Child and Family Services Agency regarding foster homes.
